Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Mayfair Plaza Motel in Sandy Bay, you'll be convenient to St. George's Anglican Church and Salamanca Market. This 4-star motel is within close proximity of Narryna Heritage Museum and Australian Army Museum Tasmania.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 21 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms feature shower/tub combinations, complimentary toiletries, and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks and coffee/tea makers, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and babysitting/childcare.

Dining
Breakfast is available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, luggage storage, and laundry facilities. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
Breakfast is available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and babysitting/childcare.

Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms feature shower/tub combinations, complimentary toiletries, and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks and coffee/tea makers, and housekeeping is provided daily.

With a stay at Mayfair Plaza Motel in Sandy Bay, you'll be convenient to St. George's Anglican Church and Salamanca Market. This 4-star motel is within close proximity of Narryna Heritage Museum and Australian Army Museum Tasmania.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

St. George's Anglican Church - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Narryna Heritage Museum - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Australian Army Museum Tasmania - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
University of Tasmania - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Markree House Museum and Garden - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Wrest Point Casino - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Salamanca Market - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Salamanca Place - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
St. Joseph's Catholic Church - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Parliament House - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Mona Ferry Terminal - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
St. David's Cathedral - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Hobart Function and Conference Centre - 1.4 km / 0.8 mi
Franklin Square - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Mawson's Huts Replica Museum - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi

The preferred airport for Mayfair Plaza Motel is Hobart, TAS (HBA-Hobart Intl.) - 15.9 km / 9.9 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
